param.name: visible
param.value: Control.HasFocus($PYTHON[30000 + int(mainmenuid) * 100 + int(id)]) | Integer.IsEqual(Window(Home).Property(CG_$PYTHON[50000 + int(mainmenuid) * 100]_CurrentWidget),$NUMBER[$PYTHON[30000 + int(mainmenuid) * 100 + int(id)]])

include.visible: Integer.IsGreater(Container($PYTHON[30000 + int(mainmenuid) * 100 + int(id)]).NumAllItems,0) | Container($PYTHON[30000 + int(mainmenuid) * 100 + int(id)]).IsUpdating

param.name: condition
param.value: [!ControlGroup($PYTHON[50000 + int(mainmenuid) * 100]).HasFocus() + System.IdleTime(1) + !Skin.HasSetting(DisableAutoScrollWidgets) + Integer.IsEqual(Container($PYTHON[50000 + int(mainmenuid) * 100]).NumItems,1)] | [$PYTHON['true' if widgetAspect in 'Banner' else 'false'] + !Control.HasFocus($PYTHON[30000 + int(mainmenuid) * 100 + int(id)]) + !Skin.HasSetting(DisableAutoScrollWidgets)]

include.visible: Integer.IsGreater(Container($PYTHON[30000 + int(mainmenuid) * 100 + int(id)]).NumAllItems,0) | Container($PYTHON[30000 + int(mainmenuid) * 100 + int(id)]).IsUpdating
